turns.speaker: client
turns.text: id like to order a few pizzas

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, where would you like to order from

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: id like to order from happys in taylor

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would yo like to order

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: id like to order the happys four pack with them all large

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, four pack in large, what do you want on the pizzas

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: on two i need them as supreme pizzas with extra sauce and garlic butter crust

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok so two are supreme pizzas with extra sauce and garlic butter crust

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes and the next one i need is triple pepperoni with extra cheese and parmeasan crust

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok the third is triple pepperoni with extra cheese and parmeasan crust

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: well wait, lets do that without the flavored crust

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok so then the third is triple pepperoni with extra cheese

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes then the fourth is going to be a seafood pizza with the alfredo sauce

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok so a seafood pizza with the alfredo sauce

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes, then i also need an extra large order of the cajun potato wedges

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok the extra large cajun wedges, is that all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: no, i also need three of the 2 liter bottles of pop, make them all sprite

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok then three 2 liter bottles of sprite

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok so you have, two large supreme pizzas with extra sauce and garlic butter crust, one triple pepperoni with extra cheese , one seafood pizza with alfredo and an extra large cajun potato wedges and three 2 liter bottles of sprite

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok so placing the order now

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ok

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the total is going to be $65.94 will be ready for pickup in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ok thanks that works well
